summary: A tough ex-U.S. Marine journalist battles against time to save the lives of thousands of innocent people after uncovering a complex terrorist plot.
cast: Dolph Lundgren|Louis Gossett Jr.|Lisa Berkley|John Finn|Gil Kopel|Howard Rypp|Ofer Lehavi|Zadok Zarum|Oren Neeman|Bruce Daniel Diker|Danny Friedman|Barry Langford|Sharon Hacohen|Mati Seri|Jonathan Dominitz|Larry Moss|John Dicks|John Fulton|Larry Price|Gilat Ankori|Gilles Ben-David|Michael Greenspan|Steve Budd|Jack Widerker|Michael Downs|Dor Zweigenboim|Mark Harrison|Rose Meshihi|Lizi Gerafi|Barak Negbi|Jonathan Cherchi|Uri Gavriel|Yaacov Gvir-Cohen|Irit Alter|Yehuda Elboim|Yehonadav Pearlman|P.C. Frieberg|Eliezer Applebaum|Doron Linnik|Jack Messinger|John Saint Ryan|Kevin Patterson|Stephen Sherman|Josh Sklar
title: Cover-Up: Rescate
